name: Soccer: Goal keeper cup PRO
description:
Enjoy football like never before with zero ads that interupt the game!!!
Goal keeper challenge: Hit left or right, there is no time to think. Be the hero tonight and save the team!!!
* Unlock heroes with different saving techniques.
* Unlock new balls and stuffs that flying to your goal.
Passing challenge: Keep on playing titi taka until your opponent exhausted.
* Unlock new balls.
Dribbling challenge: Time to go solo through the whole defense.
* Unlock new play fields.
Freekick challenge: Drag to curve the ball out of reach...
* Unlock new teams.

Play anywhere on phone, pad or watch!!!
